doc.field: Subseries III.B. Executive Director Deborah Slaner Anderson records
Subseries III.B. Executive Director Deborah Slaner Anderson records

Subseries III.B contains records of Deborah Slaner Anderson, WSF Executive Director from 1986-1991. Records include correspondence, reports, marketing materials, memos, and a series of files labelled as the "Chronological files" that include correspondence with Trustees, advisors, and donors. Of particular interest are an organizational chart and programs list for the WSF from 1988 and long-range planning documentation from 1989. Records date from 1985-1992.

Deborah Slaner Anderson was the WSF Executive Director from 1986-1991. Anderson took over the direction of the Foundation upon the move from San Francisco to New York. During her tenure, the Foundation successfully raised $3 million through the two-year "Aspire Higher" fundraising campaign. Anderson doubled the revenues from the annual awards dinner and quadrupled the endowment fund.
